name: Electro-Industrial
description: Formed in the late 1980s and early 1990s; grew out of a combination of EBM and Industrial.

children.name: Dark Electro
children.description: Emerged in the early 1990s in Europe, incorporating the abrasiveness of old school Industrial but with a greater focus on a horror-inspired atmosphere and harsh, distorted vocals.
